Posts.Content: I was diagnosed HER 2+ grade 3 in November of 2017.  I have been on multiple alternative regimines.  I recently began IV Herceptin.  I will start IV Perjetta as well in efforts to slow the growth of the tumor.  I am shopping for a surgeon also for a unilateral masx.  This has been a heck of a ride, but it seems to be just getting started.  I am also considering autologous flap reconstruction..
Posts.Title: No chemo, no radiation breast cancer
